title: Strumenti numerici | AIMA Developpement
intro: AIMA sviluppa e utilizza una vasta libreria proprietaria di strumenti software dedicati alla dinamica del fascio 6D per progettare ciclotroni innovativi.

1.title: Agora - 6D
1.description: Agora 6D è un software proprietario sviluppato da AIMA Development, appositamente progettato per lo studio della fisica delle particelle e dei ciclotroni.

slideshow.4: Trasporto in una linea di fascio - Confronto AGORA/Transport

2.title: CST – Dassault System
2.description: CST Studio Suite is a proprietary software developed by Dassault Systèmes, designed for 3D electromagnetic simulation.

slideshow.1: Surface currents in a RF cavity
slideshow.2: Comparison of CST and IBSimu trajectories in the RADIS ion source
slideshow.3: H+ trajectories in a spiral inflector

3.title: Solidworks – Dassault system
3.description: SolidWorks is a proprietary software developed by Dassault Systèmes, designed for 3D computer-aided design (CAD).

slideshow.1: CAD model of the test bench
slideshow.2: CAD model of MinicycTM and its shielding

4.title: Codes Aster / Salomé Méca – EDF
4.description: Code_Aster is an open-source software developed by EDF (Electricité de France), dedicated to numerical simulation in structural mechanics and thermomechanics.
